    • Constructor Detail

      • ComLinkDevice

        public ComLinkDevice(java.lang.String port,
                     int baudRate)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        port - COM or TTY port (like /dev/ttyS1 for Linux, or COM1 for Windows
        baudRate - use ComLinkDevice.BAUDRATE settings. For advanced settings, use getDevice() method
